programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Grace reappears and takes issue with Alex's decision to be a stay-at-home dad. Olivia's attempts at being a model employee at Swatow are not reciprocated by Nelly. Iskandar finds confidence in sharing his sketches with strangers.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates when a body is dug up in the luau pit of a Hawaiian-themed hotel. Also, Internal Affairs begins to question Grissom and Sara's return to the crime lab.

programme.title: Lingo UK S2
programme.desc: In this game show, hosted by the iconic RuPaul, the simplest of words could be worth thousands of dollars. Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: The Chase USA S3
programme.desc: Contestants compete against a professional quizzer, known as the Chaser, whose aim is to prevent the contestants from winning a cash prize. Hosted by Sara Haines.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Alltime Greatest Clip Show
programme.desc: "AllTime Greatest Clip Show" features the very best online content from creators around the world. Grouped around easy to follow themes and segments, the series covers a wide variety of clips from DIY stunts with epic fails, to polished professionals and their mind blowing achievements.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: Unboxing Art
programme.desc: Sharda joins Jagua tattoo artist Jennifer to learn the unique art of temporary tattoos. Making body expression more accessible, Jennifer breaks down the old-fashion stigma surrounding tattoos by making the form of art more approachable. Sharda learns the intricacies of the craft, from the body as a moving canvas to line work before being thrown into the deep end when she joins Jennifer at a pop-up event, tattooing actual clients.

programme.title: Slugterra S1
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.title: Johnny Test S4
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Teddies 2
programme.desc: While out hiking with Meeks, Sparky realises that she might have left her new toy hippo behind along the way, so they go about retracing their steps to try to find it - not knowing that it's actually safe at home with Tizzy! Later, Tizzy gets the idea to set up her own postal office, but soon realises that being a postie isn't as easy as it seems.

programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.desc: Dora, a young girl, starts going to school in the city of Playa Verde. Along with her friends, Kate, Naiya, Emma, Alana and Pablo, Dora embarks on various adventures to explore the city.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The Triangle Man wants to win a prize at the sports carnival so badly that he cheats, not knowing that it is a trap set by the Imp. The gang bail him out. The Imp sells extra hot chili which sets everybody's mouth on fire. Coincidentally, there is no milk in the store to help put the fires out. What will they do?

programme.title: Pikwik Pack
programme.desc: Suki's so excited to deliver a package to her hero Captain Kate! Excited to be just as brave, Suki forgets to trust her own instincts. What's in the package that could help Captain Kate's shy new mini mates join her band of sailors? Uncle Rosco the painter and Suki both learn how to shake things up ... with a little help from his nephew Oscar, and Suki's friends in the Pikwik Pack!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S8
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S2
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. programme.title: Transformers Earthspark S1
programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Busy Bodies
programme.desc: Med and Evie dance off against one another, but there is one problem! B.O. or Body Odour! All that sweating from jumping and moving around has left Med smelling stinky. He's not the only one with a problem though. Aidan has a secret smell he's trying to hide too. It's time for the team to get to the root of what's going on, and why sweating and smelling are critical for our survival!

programme.title: 绝妙的遗产
